message.content:
cs.IOT, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.DB, cs.SY. 

The paper is primarily focused on investigating IoT middleware platforms for smart application development, which falls under the domain of Internet of Things (IoT). Therefore, cs.IOT is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the need for middleware platforms to manage IoT devices and process the data generated, which can be categorized under Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the challenges faced by application developers in choosing the suitable platform, which can be categorized under Software Engineering (cs.SE). The paper also compares the features of different middleware platforms, which can be categorized under Databases (cs.DB) and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
